channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Not Serious Enough To Turn on the Siren, Toddler’s 39-Mile Ambulance Ride Still Cost Over $9,000

item.title: New limits on school loans could narrow physician and nurse pipeline, educators warn
item.description: Under new Trump administration rules, students won't be able to borrow as much for medical or nursing school or some other health professions.

item.title: More People Are Caring for Dying Loved Ones at Home. A New Orleans Nonprofit Is Showing Them How.
item.description: Demand for home health care, including at-home hospice care, has skyrocketed since the onset of the covid pandemic. A New Orleans nonprofit is teachin...

item.title: 'Nobody wants to come': What if the U.S. can no longer attract immigrant physicians?
item.description: Immigrants make up a significant proportion of all the country's doctors. New policies are making it harder and less appealing for foreign-born physic...

item.title: What foods make you happiest? It's not what you think

item.title: For millennials, being a caregiver for family can come with unique challenges

item.title: A bowhead whale's DNA offers clues to fight cancer
item.description: Scientists searching for new ways to combat cancer think they may have uncovered a promising new lead in the DNA of the bowhead whale.

item.title: Kids and Teens Go Full Throttle for E-Bikes as Federal Oversight Stalls
item.description: States, counties, and schools step in to improve safety amid an uptick in e-bike injuries, while federal regulatory efforts stagnate.
